sn42.2:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn42.2:1.2: Atha kho talaputo natagamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho talaputo natagamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.2:1.3: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam natanam bhasamananam:
sn42.2:1.4: ‘yo so nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccalikena janam haseti rameti, so kayassa bheda param marana pahasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.2:1.6: “Alam, gamani, titthatetam. Ma mam etam pucchi”ti.
sn42.2:1.7: Dutiyampi kho talaputo natagamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.2:1.8: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam natanam bhasamananam:
sn42.2:1.9: ‘yo so nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccalikena janam haseti rameti, so kayassa bheda param marana pahasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.2:1.11: “Alam, gamani, titthatetam. Ma mam etam pucchi”ti.
sn42.2:1.12: Tatiyampi kho talaputo natagamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.2:1.13: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam natanam bhasamananam:
sn42.2:1.14: ‘yo so nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccalikena janam haseti rameti, so kayassa bheda param marana pahasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.2:2.5: Pubbe kho, gamani, satta avitaraga ragabandhanabaddha.
sn42.2:2.6: Tesam nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhamma rajaniya te upasamharati bhiyyoso mattaya.
sn42.2:2.7: Pubbe kho, gamani, satta avitadosa dosabandhanabaddha.
sn42.2:2.8: Tesam nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhamma dosaniya te upasamharati bhiyyoso mattaya.
sn42.2:2.9: Pubbe kho, gamani, satta avitamoha mohabandhanabaddha.
sn42.2:2.10: Tesam nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe ye dhamma mohaniya te upasamharati bhiyyoso mattaya.
sn42.2:2.11: So attana matto pamatto pare madetva pamadetva kayassa bheda param marana pahaso nama nirayo tattha upapajjati.
sn42.2:2.13: ‘yo so nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccalikena janam haseti rameti, so kayassa bheda param marana pahasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti, sassa hoti micchaditthi.
sn42.2:2.14: Micchaditthikassa kho panaham, gamani, purisapuggalassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
sn42.2:3.1: Evam vutte, talaputo natagamani parodi assuni pavattesi.
sn42.2:3.3: ‘alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi’”ti.
sn42.2:3.4: “Naham, bhante, etam rodami yam mam bhagava evamaha;
sn42.2:3.5: api caham, bhante, pubbakehi acariyapacariyehi natehi digharattam nikato vancito paluddho:
sn42.2:3.6: ‘yo so nato rangamajjhe samajjamajjhe saccalikena janam haseti rameti so kayassa bheda param marana pahasanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’”ti.
sn42.2:3.8: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam bhagavata anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
sn42.2:3.9: Esaham, bhante, bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
sn42.2:3.10: Labheyyaham, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam, labheyyam upasampadan”ti.
sn42.2:3.11: Alattha kho talaputo natagamani bhagavato santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
